entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain or freezing rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain changing to periods of rain or drizzle in the morning and ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches developing early in the morning and dissipating in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Thursday 6 April 2023
